name: Black hole Escape
description:
Welcome!


Experience the thrilling adventure of a lost astronaut in space!
This game offers a unique experience of returning to the spaceship in zero-gravity space.
You'll become an astronaut and navigate through space using the gas thrusters of your spacesuit.
Swimming in space without gravity will provide you with new experiences and challenges.
In this unique environment, the adventure will stimulate your imagination and develop new skills.
Explore the cosmos and discover endless possibilities!

Game Features

  • Use the gas thrusters of your spacesuit to adjust your position, navigate through various obstacles, and reach your destination.
  • Be cautious with your oxygen levels by replenishing them at oxygen stations. Running out of oxygen will result in game over.
  • Be careful of impacts, as they will deplete the oxygen in your spacesuit. Returning to your lost spaceship will become more challenging.
  • Embark on an exploration with beautiful space backgrounds. Exploring the mysteries and beauty of space will delight your eyes.
  • This game offers enjoyable, thrilling, and challenging experiences. Improve your skills and enjoy the fantastic journey through space.
  • No violence. No death or injury. However, a single mistake could lead to a complete reset of your progress...
